page.title: 05Neighbours
page.content: Although the houses are spaced out,people are well-known to each other and are very aware of the lives around them.Like it or not,others often seem to know your business before you yourself do:this leads to a wrap-around community feeling in which children grow up known to everyone and knowing everyone,a strong sense of belonging and with a realisation of their own identity within the scheme of things.There is no hiding behind anonymity round here:you live with your successes and failures,your moments of glory and your follies;neither is there any fear of being lost because someone somewhere is sure to be on hand who knows you,your family and all its histories.This local knowledge seems little changed by the increased mobility of residents nowadays.
